titles.title: Dieticians in Schools Act of 2010
To authorize the Secretary of Education to make grants to local educational agencies to provide for the services of registered dieticians in schools.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

bill.summary: 9/29/2010--Introduced. Dieticians in Schools Act of 2010 - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to award competitive grants to local educational agencies so they can provide for the services of registered dieticians in their schools. Makes charter schools eligible for such grants. Requires the registered dieticians to: (1) teach students about nutrition and healthy eating habits; and (2) assist in planning the meals that are to be served in the school cafeteria to ensure that such meals are nutritious and consistent with healthy eating habits.
